tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserBehavior (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 behavior_type VARCHAR,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserBehavior (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type TEXT,
    activity_duration INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    step_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE WearableDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES UserBehavior(user_id),
    device_type TEXT,
    battery_level INT,
    firmware_version TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE device_usage (
    usage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    usage_start TIMESTAMP,
    usage_end TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  activity_duration INT,
  activity_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  heart_rate INT,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE device_usage (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  usage_hours INT,
  last_used TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE wearable_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    firmware_version VARCHAR(20),
    battery_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE device_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    error_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
